newsitem.title: FRANCE: Past dollar rise confirms US econ health-Camdessus.
newsitem.headline: Past dollar rise confirms US econ health-Camdessus.

text.p: The dollar's past rise was a clear, if perhaps late, confirmation by markets of the U.S. economy's health, International Monetary Fund chief Michel Camdessus told the French Senate on Wednesday.
"The dollar appreciated 50 percent against the yen since April 1996 and 20 percent versus the mark and franc," he said in the context of a more general overview of developments in the last decade.
He said he would not comment on the future direction but added: "I would say nevertheless that there is something healthy in what happened."
